description: Maganagi is an http://anidb.net/t1097 [Amanto] from the planet Excalibur. He came to Earth in pursuit of http://anidb.net/ch92171 [Kusanagi] and http://anidb.net/ch92172 [Saaya] and, while searching for them, he took over Senbee`s body and turned him into a serial killer that, other than killing his victims, eating their swords as well.
name: Maganagi
